flights_list_instruction2: Click a flight for 2 seconds to remove it.

add_flight_instruction2: Make sure to fill all the fields.

instructions_content:
1. Use the form to add or update airplane details.
2. Use the list to view, edit, or delete airplanes.
3. The details of the selected airplane will be displayed on the right (on larger screens).
